attributes.action: Reduce the fuel tax for a minimum of 10 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The fuel tax is getting more than the price of fuel itself, fuel is 33p per liter and the tax is over 60p per liter. we want to reduce the tax and help out those who cant afford to run a car due to the rising prices of fuel, tax and insurance. due tot his, people on benifits who need a car are not able to run a car or afford the bus as bus prices are rising due to the fuel rise.
